title: Career Paths
description: Manager and employee can enable a checkbox to verify that the user fulfills different steps in their career path. Can be installed in three different modes.

title: Competency Matrix
description: Displays a matrix with the managers team members and their status with to courses that the manager choses.

title: My Objectives
description: Displays logged in employee goals and overall progress.

title: Employee Keywords
description: Displays logged in employee skills.

title: Organization Chart
description: Display a neat expandable overview of the organisational hierarchy in SBX. You can also see all the employees and organisational managers that belongs to the organisations. The starting point in the organisational view is customizable via parameter.

title: My Skills Overview
description: Displays competencies grouped by "competeny groups" with the possibility to assess compencies.

title: Progress Checkin
description: Similar to "pulsdialog" app but with different UI and values.

title: Role Information
description: Replaced by "RolesByCategory." Displaying a list of all roles along with details.

title: Roles By Category
description: Displays all roles categorized by a custom-field. For administrators it will also show users having the roles.

title: Oktogonen
description: The app is used to, once a year verify a process called "oktagonen" for users in the team.

title: Pulsdialog
description: A simplified pulsedialog with predefined values.

title: Swedsec
description: Gathers employees from a smartlist and displays a preview of all the employees before sending them to swedsec.

title: Certification Attachment
description:
Enables the users to add transcript and attach documents to the transcript. If the course belongs to a certificate, then it will also be listed in a certificate tree view.
There is also an admin and team view for the app with the possibility to reject or accept registrations.

title: CV
description: Saba CV App. Helps you identify desired individuals based on search criteria. Customizable fields - Shows only the information you need at the moment. Select fields depending on what information is required in the CV.

title: Team Learning Overview
description: Saba Team Learning Overview App. The manager gets quick access and relevant overview of progress and completion of courses.

title: Documents
description: Saba Documents App. A good tool for securely archiving and storing important documents. Can be shared between the manager and the employee.

title: My Roles
description: Saba My Role App. A tool which gives you an overview over roles and requirements.

title: CV Search
description: Saba CV Search App. The search app is a service to easily find individuals based on various criteria e.g. language skills, experience, skills, abilities etc.

title: Job Role Library
description: Saba Job Role App. People can display and connect roles to themselves.

title: Employee Career Profile
description: Saba Employee Career Profile App. For display and self-service where users can change some information.
